title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1p1beta1\SpeechRecognitionResult
name: SpeechRecognitionResult
description:
A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1p1beta1.SpeechRecognitionResult

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getAlternatives
methods.description:
Output only. May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives).

These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.cloud.speech.v1p1beta1.SpeechRecognitionAlternative alternatives = 1;

methods.name: setAlternatives
methods.description:
Output only. May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives).

These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.cloud.speech.v1p1beta1.SpeechRecognitionAlternative alternatives = 1;

params.name: var
params.description:
Output only. May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives).

These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

methods.name: getChannelTag
methods.description:
For multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the recognized result for the audio from that channel.

For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'.

Generated from protobuf field int32 channel_tag = 2;

methods.name: setChannelTag
methods.description:
For multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the recognized result for the audio from that channel.

For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'.

Generated from protobuf field int32 channel_tag = 2;

params.name: var
params.description:
For multi-channel audio, this is the channel number corresponding to the recognized result for the audio from that channel.

For audio_channel_count = N, its output values can range from '1' to 'N'.

methods.name: getLanguageCode
methods.description:
Output only. The BCP-47 language tag of the language in this result. This language code was detected to have the most likelihood of being spoken in the audio.

Generated from protobuf field string language_code = 5;

methods.name: setLanguageCode
methods.description:
Output only. The BCP-47 language tag of the language in this result. This language code was detected to have the most likelihood of being spoken in the audio.

Generated from protobuf field string language_code = 5;
